actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the headnotes of Schedule 3 of the Tariff Schedules of the United States and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the headnotes of Schedule three of the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide that provisions for fabrics in chief value of wool shall also apply to fabrics containing recycled wool (whether or not in chief value of wool).

titles.title: A bill to amend the headnotes of Schedule 3 of the Tariff Schedules of the United States and for other purposes.
